Suggested Background Knowledge: This class assumes knowledge of regression and linear algebra, as well as basic programming knowledge in Python, R, or Matlab.
Technical Requirements and Software:
- High-speed internet connection
- Laptop or desktop computer with aminimumof a 2 GHz processor and 2 GB of RAM
- Windows or Mac iOS
- Complete Microsoft Office Suite or comparable, and ability to use Adobe PDF software (install, download, open, and convert)
- Mozilla Firefox, Chrome, and/or Safari browsers
- Matlab and R
